#340

- Growing alone in deep wet mixed oak/hickory woodland draw by a fallen hardwood log.
- Cap flat, bald, yellow with purple hues.
- Lamellae adnate (pulling away from stipe) purpleish-brown.
- Stipe collapsible with white rhizomorphs.

Additional Info
- Spore Print: brown
